metadata.synopsis: Player reaction to seeing the prisoner transform into a mind flayer after clicking on the first pod.

2.speaker: Player
2.text: We need to get out of here - before it's our turn.
2.context: NodeContext: Aghast, looking at a newborn mind flayer (realising how close a call she had while trapped in her own pod shortly beforehand)
